name: Cedalio
headline: Accurate Sustainability Data with AI
description: At Cedalio, we automate sustainability data collection using AI. Gather, extract, and consolidate data from diverse sources like PDFs, ERPs, and bills. Cedalio delivers precise, real-time, validated data for accurate carbon accounting and ESG reporting, ensuring compliance and driving sustainable business practices.

founders.name: Luciana Reznik, Founder
founders.description: Luciana is CEO at Cedalio, The trusted data platform that boosts sustainability. She is a software engineer originally from Argentina, living in the bay area since 2018. Previously she Co-founded Wolox, an end-to-end digital solutions company that was acquired by Accenture in Jan 2021.

founders.name: Nico Magni, Founder
founders.description:
Hello! I'm Nico Magni, the Chief Product Officer (CPO) at Cedalio, a database that tracks every application data change, and maintains an immutable and verifiable history. As a software engineer, I am passionate about building innovative solutions that tackle real-world challenges. 

I had the opportunity to sell my previous company to Accenture, where I gained invaluable experience in successfully scaling and delivering high-quality products.

Currently based in Patagonia, Argentina.

founders.name: Guido Marucci Blas, Founder
founders.description: CTO & co-founder at Cedalio. Previously CTO & co-founder at Wolox (acquired by Accenture). Argentinean. Passionate about building amazing developer experiences, lowering the barrier to entry to web3 and working in the intersection of developer tools and data privacy. When I'm not working I love going outdoors ‚õ∞Ô∏è, playing the guitar ü§ò and hanging out with friends!

Core Features
## Enhance Your Efficiency
Process Environmental Data Faster Than Ever‚ÄîAccurate and Easy to Analyze
### Upload Your Utility Bills
Drag and drop PDF bills into Cedalio‚Äôs platform, connect your utility provider, or integrate directly with your ERP or cloud storage (like Google Drive). You can even email the bills to us for seamless data onboarding.
###### 1000 bills / minute
Effortless processing for high-volume data.
###### +40 languages supported
Multiple language support for global scalability.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/cMUu7NSYNHe1Y00isOrZqqce8jM.png?scale-down-to=1024)

### Data Extraction & Validation
You‚Äôll have confidence in your data, whether it‚Äôs used for compliance, reporting, or strategic analysis. Cedalio extracts key data such as consumption, cost, and emissions, while also capturing deeper insights like peak/off-peak usage, contracted energy, and more. We automatically cross-check for errors and inconsistencies, ensuring data accuracy.
###### Data confidence
Ensure reliable insights with automated error checks and deep analysis.
###### Actionable Insights
Track everything from consumption to peak usage for reporting and compliance.
### Organize and Visualize
View your data through intuitive dashboards with charts, trends, and historical comparisons.
###### Rapid Anomaly Detection
Find inconsistencies quickly with clear visualizations and insights.
###### Trend Clarity
Easily spot peaks and patterns for informed decision-making.

How it Works?
## Benefits
Process Environmental Data Faster Than Ever‚ÄîAccurate and Easy to Analyze
##### Save Time, Reduce Errors, and Cut Costs
Minimize time spent on manual perusal and transcription of utility bills. Simply upload your invoices, and Cedalio rapidly extracts all pertinent information such as usage, billing duration, or payable amount. Our clientele have slashed manual processing expenses by roughly 30% and diminished data inaccuracies by 80%.
##### Scalable to Hundreds of Bills
Cedalio handles large volumes of bills effortlessly, providing analysis and insights in minutes. You can even import your historical consumption data in minutes, allowing for comprehensive insights, anomaly detection, and better energy contract management.
##### Automatic Anomaly Detection
Receive alerts on unusual consumption patterns, enabling you to act on issues before they escalate.
##### Real-Time Insights
Get a clear view of your energy consumption patterns by date, location, and type, with automated visualizations that identify peaks, trends, and anomalies. Your data is always ready for auditors, consulting firms, or your sustainability team.
##### Ready-to-Use Reports
Export data formatted for GRI, SBTi, or custom regulatory requirements‚Äîno formatting or manual edits required.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/y0HJcaqt8YI4QGXsX2sW0XbfgS4.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/90QIJGp7JKrgd1wjHTB0E9bMY.png)

## Benefits
Process Environmental Data Faster Than Ever‚ÄîAccurate and Easy to Analyze
##### Save Time, Reduce Errors, and Cut Costs
Minimize time spent on manual perusal and transcription of utility bills. Simply upload your invoices, and Cedalio rapidly extracts all pertinent information such as usage, billing duration, or payable amount. Receive alerts on unusual consumption patterns, enabling you to act on issues before they escalate.

Get a clear view of your energy consumption patterns by date, location, and type, with automated visualizations that identify peaks, trends, and anomalies. Your data is always ready for auditors, consulting firms, or your sustainability team.
